abstract: Supreme Court nominee Judge Merrick B Garland has received praise for his meticulous and able approach to cases, although  majority of them have been uncontroversial; snapshot of some of his decisions provide only glimpse of his ideological leanings.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Garland is known as an appeals court judge who respects Supreme Court precedent. His most charged cases, on national security and campaign finance, sometimes disappointed liberals.

headline.main: Where Merrick Garland Stands: A Close Look at His Judicial Record
headline.print_headline: Garland Record and Style Hint at His Appeal

snippet: Mr. Garland is known as an appeals court judge who respects Supreme Court precedent. His most charged cases, on national security and campaign finance, sometimes disappointed liberals.
